title: Ferrocenyl–triazole complexes and their use in heavy metal cation sensing
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20572-20584
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04023F, Paper

Khaled Al Khalyfeh, Asma Ghazzy, Randa M. Al-As' ad, Tobias Rüffer, Olfa Kanoun, Heinrich Lang
Ferrocenyl–triazoles synthesized, characterized and electrochemically investigated. They uses as modifier for the screen printed carbon electrodes proven toward cations sensing.
